version_description:
- Introducing Taptic Engine!
- Age and Gender input helps customize iFunny for you (we will never assume nor share your info!)
- Updated Reporting system!
- Still squashing bugs

- No more preset text when sharing links from iFunny - just the memes!
- Stability improvements

- No more preset text when sharing links from iFunny - just the memes!
- Stability improvements

- Soon open chats will let you talk to any random iFunnyer!
- Stability improvements

- Soon open chats will let you talk to any random iFunnyer!
- Stability improvements

• 60 second video uploading!
• Comment sharing!
• No more pesky text when sharing memes
• Improved meme sharing in chats!
• Chat stability enhancements

• Comment sharing!

- Total Smiles accumulated now shown on each profile!
- Open Chats now have content protection.
- Now you can share memes directly to Chats!
- Improved Chat stability and performance.
- Video playback improvements!
- Stability enhancements.

- Total Smiles accumulated now shown on each profile!
- Open Chats now have content protection.
- Now you can share memes directly to Chats!
- Improved Chat stability and performance.
- Video playback improvements!
- Stability enhancements.

- Comment Sharing helps make sure no one misses out on a fun conversation!
- New Meme Pinning lets you showcase your favorite memes at the top of your Profile!
- Notifications can now be customized, so you only get the ones you want to see!

- Comment Sharing helps make sure no one misses out on a fun conversation!

- New Meme Pinning lets you showcase your favorite memes at the top of your Profile!
- Notifications can now be customized, so you only get the ones you want to see!

- The new Videos tab offers up a supply of the best videos of all times!
- Open Chats - Meet some new people and make new friends by heading to the Explore section and finding a Chat that interests you!
- Stability enhancements.

- The new Videos tab offers up a supply of the best videos of all times!

- Open Chats - Meet some new people and make new friends by heading to the Explore section and finding a Chat that interests you!
- Stability enhancements.
Stability improvements.
Stability improvements.

- New banning system allows users to see banned content highlighted on their profiles and can appeal account bans.
- Video mute/unmute bug is fixed!
- New confirmation screen when sending images to chats - no more happy little accidents!
- Stability and performance improvements.

- New banning system allows users to see banned content highlighted on their profiles and can appeal account bans.
- Video mute/unmute bug is fixed!
- New confirmation screen when sending images to chats - no more happy little accidents!
- Stability and performance improvements.

- You can now sign up for chat without a phone number!
- New confirmation screen when sending videos to chats.
- New feature added where you can find your friends and invite them to iFunny!
- Additional stability and performance improvements.

- The Videos feed is back! Now you can enjoy all of the most popular videos in one spot!
- Features are back to newest features first!
- New banning system! Now most bans are temporary and can be appealed on your profile.

- You can now add images to your comments! Share your memes from your collection, or links to other memes, when chatting with others!
- New Subscribe button next to profile names on content. Now you can instantly subscribe to profiles from any of your feeds!
- Now any content that was blackholed will be marked on your profile.
- Additional stability and performance improvements.

- Don’t like the number sticking next to Features? You can now reset the Feature counter by long-pressing the numbers!
- New notifications let you know whenever one of your Subscribers uses one of your memes, and vice versa!
- Additional stability and performance improvements.
Additional stability and performance improvements.

- Added a report feature for ads - Now you can report any ads that cause issues!
- Additional stability and performance improvements.

- Added a report feature for ads - Now you can report any ads that cause issues!
- Additional stability and performance improvements.

- Mentions are here! You can now tag your friends in comments to share a meme or conversation!
- New interactive blocks in all feeds makes finding great content easier!
- iOS 12 Support
- Additional stability and performance updates.

- Added a report feature for ads - Now you can report any ads that cause issues!
- Additional stability and performance improvements.

- Mentions are here! You can now tag your friends in comments to share a meme or conversation!
- New interactive blocks in all feeds makes finding great content easier!
- iOS 12 Support
- Additional stability and performance updates.

* You can now help protect your account with email and phone number confirmation! Keep all your profiles secure!
* Get ready for Halloween!

* You can now help protect your account with email and phone number confirmation! Keep all your profiles secure!
* Get ready for Halloween!

* You can now clear out your phone number from your account.
* New Trending Comments helps you view the most popular comments and see what everyone’s talking about!

* Updated banning system. We’ve softened the content creation ban!
* Cosmetic updates for comments.
* Squishing bugs and performance improvements
Map improvements and bug fixes!
– New feature: iFunny map. Find best memers nearby!
– New feature: iFunny map. Find best memers nearby!

* Disable annoying achievements alerts!
* Squishing some pesky bugs

* Now you can support your friends with a Boosted meme!
* Smushing bugs and other fixes
* Updating to support for iOS 13
Bug fixes and performance improvements
* Performance improvements and bug fixes!

* Weekly Digest added! Now you can see a compilation of the best memes of the week!
* Added Spam Protection for Open Chats!
